title: In this thread we list amazing League designs.
body:
Let's thank the devs who've worked hard to make our experience the best we can have.

Here I'll start us off on some of the most balanced and fun designs in the game.

1) Maximum % HP True Damage

2) Duskblade

3) Kalista

Feel free to add your own! Just no listing poor designs, this is a serious thread, thank you.
